arStrings.szText: Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill grants you {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]{/c} seconds, stacking up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} times. Upon reaching maximum stacks, you enter a Vampiric Bloodrage, gaining {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|x%|]{/c} {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill damage and {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 4"]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Basic{/c} Skills grant you a stacking Attack Speed bonus. At maximum stacks, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|x%|]{/c} increased {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill damage and Movement Speed.
